details.overview: The nitrate vulnerable zone (NVZ) self assessment tool checks if your farming methods meet NVZ regulations and if you need to make any changes
details.more_information:
This tool uses [Government Gateway](/government-gateway "Government Gateway"). 

##Getting help
Contact the Defra Helpline if you have any queries about the nitrate vulnerable zone regulations.

$C
**Defra Helpline**  
<onlinehelp@defra.gsi.gov.uk>   
08459 33 55 77   
Monday to Friday, 9am to 5pm  

$C

##Agents
Sign up as an [agent](https://secure.services.defra.gov.uk/wps/portal/wfa/!ut/p/c5/04_SB8K8xLLM9MSSzPy8xBz9CP0os3gzdx8LQyd_A0t3X3dHA08fM1fvAEdXY3cTI6B8JE55A3dDSnQbmBHQHQ5yLX7b8cmDzAfJG-AAjgb6fh75uan6BbmhEQaZAekAekimGQ!!/dl3/d3/L2dBISEvZ0FBIS9nQSEh/ "Sign up as an agent for Defra farm surveys and assessments"){:rel="external"} if you want to use the tool for more than one farmer.


##Scotland and Wales
If you're in Scotland, you can [use the Nmax calculator and compliance tool.](http://www.scotland.gov.uk/Topics/farmingrural/Agriculture/Environment/NVZintro/NmaxCalcandGuidance "use the Nmax calculator and compliance tool on the Scottish Government website"){:rel="external"}

If you're in Wales, find out what NVZ tools are available by calling the NVZ Wales helpline.

$C 
**NVZ Wales helpline**  
01824 704060
$C

*[NVZ]: Nitrate Vulnerable Zone
*[Defra]: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs 
*[CPH]: County Parish Holding
details.introduction: Use this quick and easy tool to learn about nitrate vulnerable zone regulations and make sure your farming practices meet them.
